Key Match Events: Jackson Chourio hit two solo home runs, including a game-tying blast in the bottom of the eighth inning.
Garrett Mitchell followed with a two-run shot to give the Brewers the lead.
Devin Williams closed out the game in the top of the ninth inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Mets fans expressed frustration with the team's inability to secure a win and the bullpen's performance.
The loss was seen as a missed opportunity for the Mets in the playoffs due to the physical toll of a doubleheader.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers prevented a sweep and forced a Game 3 with their win.
The article mentions the series context and the impact of the win for the Brewers.
